column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Two of my favorite dishes were the octopus and potato
column3: there was very little octopus and a whole helluva lot of potato. Kind of a rip off
column4: as I would have like to see more octopus. The same dish at Iberico is much more satisfying than here
column5: but I still enjoyed it. I also (surprisingly) loved the seafood paella. Now
column6: I lived in Spain for a year and have had my share of authentic
column8: and of course Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba isn't quite there yet
column9: but it was damn good. Nice and creamy with a good dose of seafood peppered throughout the dish
